column4: just installed 7.10 amd64 and when im in the appearance preferences under the visual effects tab and i try to enable custom tick it loads for a sec and then says "! desktop effects could not be enabled" can someone help me?
do you have graphics drivers installed? some UI features only work (properly) on hardware.
also make sure you run a search for "nvidia" in synaptic and install anything that sounds remotely useful. including the drivers-new-something package...
